bs-usermanager-desc: Administration interface for adding, editing and deleting users
bs-usermanager-no-self-desysop: You cannot take away your own sysop right.
bs-usermanager-confirmdisableuser: Do you really want to deactivate {{PLURAL:$1|this user|these $1 users}}?
bs-usermanager-confirmenableuser: Do you really want to activate {{PLURAL:$1|this user|these $1 users}}?
bs-usermanager-group-add-not-allowed: You are not allowed to add users to group $1
bs-usermanager-group-remove-not-allowed: You are not allowed to remove users from group $1
bs-usermanager-multipleuserselected: You can only change password for one user at a time
right-usermanager-editpassword: Change user passwords with the manager on the [[Special:UserManager]] special page
bs-usermanager-label-password-change-str: Send password reset link to user
bs-usermanager-no-mail: Selected user does not have confirmed email address
bs-usermanager-warning-password-change-o: You are changing your own password. You will be logged out and redirected to the login page.
